body:
I don't have such a plan yet. I'd accept contributions.

On Fri, Jan 5, 2018 at 3:20 PM, Arman Zharmagambetov <
notifications@github.com> wrote:

> @alextp <https://github.com/alextp> Hi! I'm just wondering, are tf
> developers planning to implement diagonal Hessian implementation (either in
> eager mode or in tensorflow)? Thanks!
